author: Tian
message:
HAYYY DEVANUYY!!
HEPIBESDAYY YAHHHH!!! SELAMAT ULANG TAHUNN KE 18!! udah 18 jir keknya kemaren masi muda banget 2008 aowkaowko, becandaa queen, eh iya 2008 jadi 18 sekarang, bener bener bener, semoga di umur 18 nya bisa dapet apa yang maw di dapetin yaahhh!! semoga lancar kuliah, gereja, main main, apa kekk, tapi aneh ga si kalo gw gini?? bukan gw yang biasanya wok, ya sekali sekali serius dehhh hehee..

yahh bentar lagi balik ke nangor yahh ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜” keknya baru ketemu yagasii?!? ni udah maw balikk, lu ga kangen depok apaa depokk, kek ayolaaa, tapi gapapaaa seneng bisaa ketemu lu walau bentar doang, tapi cepet cepet balik sini ya, gausa di nangor, nanti DEKvani kesepian ğŸ¤—, engga enggaa, gausa buru buruu, cuma kalo ada waktu lamaaa, kesini yaaa, main mainn lagii, seneng seneng lagii bareng barengg, sirkel bergabung lagi la yaaa ipa 1 kembali lagii, kita haruss jalan jalan lagii yakkk, seenggaknya sebelum pergii ke nangorr, kita ngasi kenang kenangan yang wow dehh hahahaha

keknyaa taun lalu ada kue.. hehe ENGGA ENGGAAA DEV, tapi kalo dirayain lagi maw ga dev awok, tapi janji gada bete bete lagii yaa, jangan sedi jangan sedihhh adaa ini anuu ee, gitu lahh

jadi intinyaaa....
sebenernya gada yang bisa gw ucapin banyak banyakk sii ke lu, yang bisa gw ucapin ke lu, mungkin ga spesial banget hwhahaha, tapi intinyaa walau gada lu disini, gw tetep suprot meski ga kliatan, intinya jan lupain gw yaa oke??? kaciw si sampe dilupain, sama jangan lupa soes nya ya devv hehe, ntar kado nya gw cari lagi kalo niat, atau kalo lu rasa si mihu mihu itu kurang hahahwhw, tapi yaaa, hepibesdayy yahhhh ke 18, besok kita mabok gas, hwhwhwhwh dahhh itu aja la yaa keknyaaa, jan kangen yaağŸ¤—ğŸ¤—

author: Mikko
message:
I hope you weren't too surprised when I gave you the link hehe. Happy birthday to the kindest, gentlest, most patient, and most God-fearing person I know wkwk. I wish you love, joy, good health, and another year full of pleasant surprises ğŸ˜, be it here at home or when you eventually go back to nangor, I'm sure you'll do just fine.

I also wanted to say again, thank you for enduring whoever I was for around 2 year. Thanks for your patience, your guidance, and for every second that you chose to waste on me to help solve the everlasting mess that was high school. I swear this will be the last time I'll mention it at least for a while since I'm sure we're both not in the mood for that rn. I'm glad it's past us.

Though it was a shipwreck, a whirlwind of emotions, whatever it was, I just wanna say from the bottom of my heart, I'm glad from all that, I got to know you as a friend. I learned things that I would have never learned because of you, and I'm glad that the person who reintroduced me to Him was none other than you!

Speaking of that, if you wanna, we can watch The Chosen and you can get the satisfaction of seeing me me bawl my eyes out ğŸ˜, anyways maap for the yapping wkwk, again I wish you luck for the future Dev! cook semester 2, spekta, semester 3, and beyond!!! Moga2 dapet beasiswa, IPK 4, masuk hima (kalo mau), bemf bemu (kalo mau), di nangor gapernah keujanan, gapernah telat masuk kelas, ga kena macet gate palang unpad, inget Tuhan walopun jauh dari rumah, ati2 nanti ngendarain motor, stay safe and GOD BLESSSS 

 (btw while you're away, you bet i'll be brainstorming ideas buat jalan2 libur semester 2 so i hope you're looking forward to that ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ sekian dari saya)
